plot: Outlaw Fast Draw (Álvarez) assaults stagecoach with passengers Clay Stone (Beir), singer Katy Dior (Marandi) and gambler Fred Foster (Mathot), but Stone is ready to take revenge.
title: Las malditas pistolas de Dallas
plot_es: Outlaw Fast Draw (Álvarez) assaults stagecoach with passengers Clay Stone (Beir), singer Katy Dior (Marandi) and gambler Fred Foster (Mathot), but Stone is ready to take revenge.
plot_en: Outlaw Fast Draw (Álvarez) assaults stagecoach with passengers Clay Stone (Beir), singer Katy Dior (Marandi) and gambler Fred Foster (Mathot), but Stone is ready to take revenge.
